page.title: 02Industry in East Huntspill
page.content: The Milk Marketing Board was built in 1905.A Spray Dryer and varous other small new buildings have been built on since then.Some of the machines are electric and some are worked by the air pressure or hydraulics.About thirty women work during the day and fifteen at night in the cheese department.About forty-one men work on shift work.About twenty other men do days and nights as fitters and boiler-men.The women work from 8.00 to 16.30 on days and 17.30 to 22.00 on nights.Men on shifts work from 6am - 6pm or 6pm - 6am.The cheeses which have been made elsewhere are cut and packed at the factory.The cheeses are Cheddar,Red Leicester,and Cheshire. They also pack caramel powder,yeast powder,jam accacia powder and dextrose powder as well as cheese.These items go to the holiday industry and abroad.
